name: Golden G. Richard III
content: Home Golden George Richard III, Ph.D. Professor of Computer Science and Engineering Director of the LSU Cyber Center and Applied Cybersecurity Lab Associate Director for Cybersecurity, Center for Computation and Technology (CCT) Louisiana State University (LSU) GIAC/GCFA Gold Certified Digital Forensics Investigator Fellow, American Academy of Forensic Sciences (AAFS) Member, Sigma Xi and the American Association for the Advancement of Science (AAAS) Awarded the Order of Thor by the Military Cyber Professionals Association. golden@cct.lsu.edu
